About

Goals

  1. Provide a way for the Women Employees of BYU-Idaho to socialize and become acquainted with each other.
  2. Encourage and support the furthering of education by providing grants.
  3. Establish a unity between departments as workers become more familiar with each other.
  4. Keep the luncheon price low to encourage participation.
  5. Alternate meetings between Wednesdays and Thursdays to accommodate faculty schedules so hopefully they can come to one meeting or the other.

Board

Current Board Members

  • President: Janna Nelson
  • President Elect: Marci Nite
  • Committee Member: Karri Tingey

Board Responsibilities

President

  • Work with Kevin Miyasaki to fund and organize the Women's Association.
  • When a board member complete their term, contact Brother miyasaki and recommend a replacement.
  • In December e-mail a brief overview of the year and request funds for the next year.
  • Work with Mike Kelley in Financial Aid to process and award Grants when money is available.   At least once a year and twice if money allows.  Mike can tell you how much is in the fund.  Start the process at least 6 weeks prior to the luncheon.  Applicants do need to fill out a FAFSA form as well.
  • Coordinate with ticket office for luncheon tickets and verify that accounting gets the transfer of  funds from the tickets to Women's GL.
  • Ticket Request form
  • Maintain the Women's Association Web Site.
  • Work with the board planning the luncheons.
  • Each year alternate between Wednesdays and Thursdays to try and accomodate everyone.

President Elect

  • Work with the current President and committee member for one year (three events) and then become the President for one year.

Board Member

  • Assist the President and President Elect for two years (six events).

Board Tasks

  • Plan and schedule events. Order food, set up, decorate, serve the luncheons. Spotlight employees, plan programs and entertainment, advertise and encourage members of the association.
